Home.description: A comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free of Sharia violations.
Home.whatIsCryptoDesc: Halal Crypto is a comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free from Sharia violations, leading the trader in cryptocurrency markets to earn Halal income, devoid of usury or any forms of forbidden earnings. To achieve this goal, Halal Crypto Office for Sharia auditing and supervision on cryptocurrency market transactions was established in October 2021 by Dr. Mohamed Youssef Abu Jazar, a specialist in comparative jurisprudence, specifically financial transactions, and a member of the Islamic Economy Forum, the Palestinian Scholars Association, and a Sharia arbitrator in financial matters for the past 12 years.

Footer.description: A comprehensive project aimed at creating a trading environment free of Sharia violations.
